_meta.description: Bank of Canada dataset mapping configuration
_meta.notes: Each dataset becomes a wide table with date as index and series as columns. Description field provides context for LLM queries.

coverage_summary.excluded_series: ~6000 (research papers, chart data, legacy, detailed distributions)
coverage_summary.rationale: Focus on continuously updated, policy-relevant time series. Exclude one-off publications and granular distributions.

exchange_rates_daily.title: Bank of Canada: Daily Exchange Rates
exchange_rates_daily.description: Bank of Canada daily indicative foreign exchange rates for Canadian dollar (CAD) against 26 major world currencies, updated each business day around 16:30 ET.

FXUSDCAD.description: US dollars per 1 Canadian dollar - the most traded CAD currency pair

FXEURCAD.description: Euros per 1 Canadian dollar - key European trading partner rate

FXCHFCAD.description: Swiss francs per 1 Canadian dollar - traditional safe haven currency

FXAUDCAD.description: Australian dollars per 1 CAD - fellow commodity currency

FXNZDCAD.description: New Zealand dollars per 1 Canadian dollar

FXCNYCAD.description: Chinese yuan per 1 CAD - China is Canada's 2nd largest trading partner

FXHKDCAD.description: Hong Kong dollars per 1 Canadian dollar

FXKRWCAD.description: South Korean won per 1 Canadian dollar

FXMXNCAD.description: Mexican pesos per 1 CAD - USMCA trading partner

FXZARCAD.description: South African rand per 1 Canadian dollar

FXNOKCAD.description: Norwegian kroner per 1 CAD - fellow oil-exporting nation

FXSARCAD.description: Saudi riyals per 1 CAD - pegged to USD

FXCADUSD.description: Canadian dollars per 1 US dollar - inverse of usd_cad

effective_exchange_rate.title: Bank of Canada: Canadian Effective Exchange Rate Index (CEER)
effective_exchange_rate.description: Bank of Canada trade-weighted index measuring the Canadian dollar against a basket of currencies. A higher CEER means CAD has appreciated relative to trading partners.

CEER_BROAD_D_N.description: Daily nominal CEER against all trading partners weighted by bilateral trade

CEER_NARROW_D_N.description: Daily nominal CEER against major currencies only (USD, EUR, JPY, GBP, etc.)

CEER_XUS_D_N.description: Daily nominal CEER excluding US dollar - useful for non-US trade analysis

CEER_BROAD_M_N.description: Monthly average nominal CEER against all trading partners

CEER_BROAD_M_R.description: Monthly real CEER adjusted for inflation differentials between Canada and partners

CEER_NARROW_M_R.description: Monthly real CEER against major currencies, inflation-adjusted

CEER_XUS_M_R.description: Monthly real CEER excluding USD, shows competitiveness vs non-US partners

bond_yields_daily.title: Bank of Canada: Government of Canada Bond Yields
bond_yields_daily.description: Bank of Canada daily benchmark yields for Government of Canada bonds across the maturity spectrum. These are risk-free rates that form the foundation for Canadian interest rates.

BD.CDN.2YR.DQ.YLD.description: 2-year GoC bond yield - sensitive to near-term Bank of Canada policy expectations

BD.CDN.5YR.DQ.YLD.description: 5-year GoC bond yield - benchmark for fixed mortgage rates in Canada

BD.CDN.10YR.DQ.YLD.description: 10-year GoC bond yield - key benchmark for long-term borrowing costs

BD.CDN.LONG.DQ.YLD.description: Long-term GoC bond yield (30+ years) - reflects long-run inflation expectations

BD.CDN.RRB.DQ.YLD.description: Real Return Bond yield - inflation-indexed, shows real interest rate expectations

overnight_rates.title: Bank of Canada: Canadian Overnight Repo Rate Average (CORRA)
overnight_rates.description: Bank of Canada CORRA benchmark overnight interest rate for Canadian dollar markets, measuring the cost of overnight funding secured by Government of Canada bonds.

CORRA.description: Daily CORRA rate - the volume-weighted median repo rate for overnight transactions

CORRA.COMPOUNDED.INDEX.description: Compounded CORRA index for calculating interest on CORRA-linked instruments

CORRA_TOTAL_VOLUME.description: Total dollar volume of all overnight repo trades used in CORRA calculation

CORRA_TRIMMED_VOLUME.description: Trimmed volume after removing outlier trades from CORRA calculation

CORRA_RATE_AT_PERCENTILE_5.description: 5th percentile of overnight repo rates - lower bound of typical trading range

CORRA_RATE_AT_PERCENTILE_75.description: 75th percentile of overnight repo rates - upper bound of typical trading range

commodity_price_index_monthly.title: Bank of Canada: Commodity Price Index (Monthly)
commodity_price_index_monthly.description: Bank of Canada monthly index tracking prices of commodities produced in Canada and sold in world markets. Critical for understanding terms of trade and CAD movements.

INDINF_CPITOT_M.description: Total Bank of Canada Commodity Price Index - overall commodity price trends

INDINF_CPIENER_M.description: Energy component of BCPI - oil, natural gas, coal prices affecting Alberta/Saskatchewan

INDINF_CPINE_M.description: Non-energy BCPI - agricultural, forestry, metals, minerals

commodity_price_index_annual.title: Bank of Canada: Commodity Price Index (Annual)
commodity_price_index_annual.description: Bank of Canada annual averages of commodity price indices by sector. Useful for long-term trend analysis.

A.BCPI.description: Annual total BCPI - average commodity price level for the year

A.BCNE.description: Annual non-energy BCPI - excludes volatile oil and gas prices

A.ENER.description: Annual energy component - crude oil, natural gas dominate

A.AGRI.description: Annual agricultural commodity prices - wheat, canola, livestock

A.FISH.description: Annual fisheries commodity prices - seafood exports

A.FOPR.description: Annual forestry products - lumber, pulp, paper prices

inflation_measures_monthly.title: Bank of Canada: Consumer Price Inflation (Monthly)
inflation_measures_monthly.description: Bank of Canada monthly inflation measures including headline CPI and preferred core measures used for monetary policy decisions.

INDINF_CPI_MEDIAN_M.description: CPI-median - Bank of Canada's preferred core measure, median price change across basket

INDINF_CPI_TRIM_M.description: CPI-trim - excludes components with most extreme price changes each month

INDINF_CPI_COMMON_M.description: CPI-common - tracks common price movements across basket, filters idiosyncratic

inflation_measures_quarterly.title: Bank of Canada: Consumer Price Inflation (Quarterly)

excluded_series._comment: Series excluded because they are legacy/stale, one-off charts, or research paper appendices

legacy_exchange_rates.description: Legacy noon rates discontinued April 2017, superseded by new FX* series

legacy_banking_stats.description: Historical banking statistics no longer updated (last update 2017-2020)

chart_series.description: One-off chart data from publications - not continuous time series, embedded in specific reports

research_paper_data.description: Data accompanying specific research papers - context-dependent, not standard releases

detailed_distributions.description: Granular bucket distributions (e.g., 5-6%, 6-7%) - too fine-grained for most use cases

auction_operational_data.description: Bond auction operational details - ISINs, settlement dates, amounts - not time series analysis

balance_sheet_items.description: Bank of Canada balance sheet line items - specialized financial reporting
